text: Aruer kamningɨn Judaba uan apaniba agɨfa. Ezɨ iakɨnir kamra men osɨmtɨzim ko arareba gɨfa, ezɨ Judabar naviba derazɨ me bar akonge. Ezɨ Mordekai me mɨgɨa ghaze, ia isar ekiabav kɨm dar amu egh dar ikɨ. Egh dagher aghuiba uari ikarvagh uari danɨng, egh gumazir biziba puvatɨziba ia uaghan biziba me danɨng.
